ILBMatrix4x4 Struct Reference

Data Fields
ILBMatrix4x4 Struct Reference

This reference page is linked to from the following overview topics: The Beast Coordinate System, Creating Mesh Instances.

Search for all occurrences

#include <beastapitypes.h>

Class Description

Matrix for transformations.


The data is stored line by line (the opposite of OpenGL)
Indices are laid out like this:
(00 01 02 03)
(04 05 06 07)
(08 09 10 11)
(12 13 14 15)

Examples:

examples-physical/code/common/vecmath.h, examples/code/common/vecmath.h, include/beastapi/beastapitypes.h, include/beastapi/beastcamera.h, include/beastapi/beastinstance.h, include/beastapi/beastlightsource.h, maya/beastmayaplugin/include/beastwrappers/beastcamerawrapper.h, maya/beastmayaplugin/include/beastwrappers/beastinstancewrapper.h, maya/beastmayaplugin/include/beastwrappers/beastlightwrapper.h, maya/beastmayaplugin/include/beastwrappers/beastscenewrapper.h, maya/beastmayaplugin/include/mayacallbacks/livetransform.h, maya/beastmayaplugin/include/mayautils.h, maya/beastmayaplugin/include/scenemanager.h, maya/beastmayaplugin/src/beastwrappers/beastcamerawrapper.cpp, maya/beastmayaplugin/src/beastwrappers/beastinstancewrapper.cpp, maya/beastmayaplugin/src/beastwrappers/beastlightwrapper.cpp, maya/beastmayaplugin/src/beastwrappers/beastscenewrapper.cpp, maya/beastmayaplugin/src/mayautils.cpp, and maya/beastmayaplugin/src/scenemanager.cpp.

Field Documentation

float ILBMatrix4x4::m[16]
Search for all occurrences

The actual data in the matrix.

Examples:
